short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to pronounce the topic of a wikipedia page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button next on a Wikipedia page next to the topic header that allows for text to speech of the topic name. Options allow changing the language, volume, and speed of the voice. NOTE: Language selection doesn't currently change anything. Will fix in future.
